definition: (bird species of China) purple-naped sunbird (Hypogramma hypogrammicum)
pillow/to pillow/to rest one's head on (Taiwan pr. [zhen4] for this sense)
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
